title: Can you transfer VHS tapes to your iPhone or iPad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can. This will be a painful process to go through. I do not recommend it unless you have sufficient time and money to do this. Today it is difficult to even find a decent VHS machine that can reliably play back 100 tape clips. Since you asked the question, you have no idea how complicated and expensive it is to take VHS, digitize the signal, then record it in the proper format to your computer to then upload to your iPhone. This is done all the time, but it ain’t pretty.

“Can you transfer VHS tapes to your iPhone or iPad?” No, not directly; but you could capture the VCR/VHS output onto a computer with the proper cables and capturing hardware & software, then convert the captured video into an iPhone/iPad compatible format, then use iTunes to upload this to your device; assuming your device has enough space for storage.
